Title: Sharepoint Date Picker Control for ghosted application pages.
Description: This control can be a good alternative to [url:WSS's DateTimeControl|http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.sharepoint.webcontrols.datetimecontrol.aspx] as this guy also gives you option to directly jump years.

Sharepoint Date Picker Control

This control can be a good alternative to WSS's DateTimeControl as this guy also gives you option to directly jump years.
